section:
GLM_EXT_vector_float1_precision GLM_EXT_vector_float1_precision Collaboration diagram for GLM_EXT_vector_float1_precision:
Typedefs
typedef vec< 1, float, highp > glm::highp_vec1
1 component vector of single-precision floating-point numbers using high precision arithmetic in term of ULPs.
typedef vec< 1, float, mediump > glm::mediump_vec1
1 component vector of single-precision floating-point numbers using medium precision arithmetic in term of ULPs.
typedef vec< 1, float, lowp > glm::lowp_vec1
1 component vector of single-precision floating-point numbers using low precision arithmetic in term of ULPs.
Detailed Description
Exposes highp_vec1, mediump_vec1 and lowp_vec1 types.
Include <glm/ext/vector_float1_precision.hpp> to use the features of this extension.
See also
GLM_EXT_vector_float1 extension.
